name: Till Death
description: A woman is left handcuffed to her dead husband as part of a sick revenge plot. Unable to unshackle, she has to survive as two killers arrive to finish her off.

review.author: jfgibson73
review.heading: Does what it sets out to do
review.reviewBody: I too am surprised at the negative reviews and low rating. I thought this was a fairly well structured little thriller. I didn't think too much about it or expect great performances. I just went in for some light entertainment, and it was fine. I thought all the pieces fit together well enough. I don't think I would ever watch it again, and I don't disagree with anyone who wasn't into it, but I got some enjoyment from it.

keywords: hired killer,snow,revenge plot,handcuffed to a dead man,lake house
